segments.text: I'm just watching this whole situation, and it's starting to irritate me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink has been overflowing for what feels like ages now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading onto the floor, creating a massive puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Think of the water damage to those nice cabinets, it's just reckless!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the poor woman has her foot right in it, absolutely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, running unchecked like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are those children, making their own mess with the cookie crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to make a huge mess when that stool finally gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, the whole kitchen is becoming a disaster zone, and no one cares!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes my skin crawl to think of the wet, possibly sticky floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness from the adult is truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a monument to neglect and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a prime example of how quickly things can go wrong if you're not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning up this inevitable disaster just fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR
